mapper.select: SELECT cntnt_id, cntnt_cate_code, cntnt_title, cntnt_kwrd, cntnt_url, cntnt_regist_date, cntnt_update_date, cntnt_delete_yn FROM tb_cntnt WHERE cntnt_id = #{cntntId} and cntnt_delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT cntnt_id, cntnt_cate_code, cntnt_title, cntnt_kwrd, cntnt_url, cntnt_regist_date, cntnt_update_date, cntnt_delete_yn FROM tb_cntnt WHERE cntnt_delete_yn = 'N' and (
(
cntnt_kwrd LIKE ('%' || #{addr}|| '%')
) or
(
cntnt_title LIKE ('%' || #{addr}|| '%')
) )

SELECT count(*) FROM tb_cntnt a JOIN tb_common_code b ON a.cntnt_cate_code = b.common_code WHERE cntnt_delete_yn = 'N'
AND b.common_code_val = #{commonCodeVal}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cntnt (cntnt_id, cntnt_cate_code, cntnt_title, cntnt_kwrd, cntnt_url, cntnt_regist_date, cntnt_delete_yn) VALUES (cntnt_seq.NEXTVAL, #{cntntCateCode}, #{cntntTitle}, #{cntntKwrd}, #{cntntUrl}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_cntnt SET cntnt_cate_code = #{cntntCateCode}, cntnt_title = #{cntntTitle}, cntnt_kwrd = #{cntntKwrd}, cntnt_update_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE cntnt_id = #{cntntId}
UPDATE tb_cntnt SET cntnt_delete_YN = 'Y', cntnt_update_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE cntnt_id = #{cntntId}
